channel.title: What are some use cases for RECALLABLE tokens?
channel.description:
Some example use cases: - Subscription system: where you pay a monthly fee to be subscribed to a service. The owner of the service must be able to withdraw your right to use it (if you don't pay for example). - Badges that indicate AML/KYC: The issuer must be able to take it back if the user no longer meet the requirements - NFTs that indicate ownership of in-game assets: the game must be able to remove the NFT in you inventory if you lose that item
*From cbisaillon#6447 on [Discord](https://discord.com/channels/417762285172555786/765994894749597697/921495334390227014)*
